hypothesis_content.title: BTC Correlation Breakout for Politico-Memecoins During Neutral Regime
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes (61.5% confidence), politico-memecoins (TRUMP) will decouple from BTC correlation when BTC shows 3-day consolidation (<2% range) and TRUMP trading volume spikes >200% 7D average, signaling independent catalyst-driven momentum.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral markets, capital rotates to narrative-driven assets. TRUMP has shown independent momentum during political events. BTC consolidation reduces systemic risk, allowing idiosyncratic memecoin narratives to dominate price action.
entry_conditions: TRUMP 24h volume >200% of its 7D average volume
TRUMP/BTC pair breaks above 20-day Bollinger Band upper band

exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC resumes trend (>3% move) and TRUMP/BTC correlation reverts to >0.8

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: TRUMP volume spike fails to generate sustained momentum, and price reverts to high BTC correlation (>0.8) within 2 days despite neutral regime.
